titleStmt.title: A true relation of the sentence and condemnation of Thomas Dangerfield, at the King's Bench Bar, for his horrid crimes and perjuries.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Walter Davis,

notesStmt.note: Text concludes with a short poem.
At foot: "This may be printed. July 2. 1685. R.L.S."
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
